name: Bezirk
description:
Welcome to Bezirk! Bezirk is a 2D firefighting simulation you have never seen before. You can build your own Fire-Departments, get new Firefighters, buy vehicles. You can even advance your game through Modding and the coming Workshop.
Functions:

  • Build your own Fire-Department.
  • Buy vehicles from real brand like ROSENBAUER or MAGIRUS.
  • Get new Firefighters. They can be in every position you want them to be.
  • Of course your people & your vehicles also have to do your job: Drive to your operation, fill out your report or get points.
  • A Workshop so the game can get even more fun!
